person.persName: Charles Alfred Hardin (Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Columbia, Kentucky, native. Son of Parker and Caroline Hardin. Graduate of Centre College in Danville, Kentucky, in 1856. Married to Jennie Magoffin on May 9, 1859. Attorney in Mercer County in 1860. Judge of the Mercer Circuit Court in Mercer County.
